title: Bootstrap fails due to system LLVM libffi link error

labels.name: A-linkage
labels.description: Area: linking into static, shared libraries and binaries

labels.name: A-LLVM
labels.description: Area: Code generation parts specific to LLVM. Both correctness bugs and optimization-related issues.

labels.name: T-bootstrap
labels.description: Relevant to the bootstrap subteam: Rust's build system (x.py and src/bootstrap)

labels.name: S-blocked
labels.description: Status: marked as blocked ❌ on something else such as an RFC or other implementation work.

For some reason the correct llvm configuration is not being detected and `-lffi` has to be passed manually for the bootstrap to succeed.
